name: Block Breaker (CheezeeChicken)
description:
Up Arrow Key - Rotate

Left Arrow Key - Move Left

Right Arrow Key - Move Right

Down Arrow Key - Drop

Esc - Pause Game

There are two types of blocks, normal and breaker.

Normal blocks stack up. If you form multiple blocks into a rectangle, they combine and are worth more points. The bigger the rectangle, the more points they are worth!

Breaker blocks destroy any adjacent blocks and all connected blocks of the same color.
